items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Extension Prep Shampoo helps to clean your clients hair and scalp pre-install.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s Extension Prep Shampoo helps to clean your clients hair and scalp pre-install. Prep Shampoo washes away residual stickiness, renews the scalp, and cleanses the hair for peak installation results. It is the most important way to begin every extension installation.

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Not for daily use.
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Beautify - Extension Prep Shampoo - 128 fl oz, Gallon
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - Extension Prep Shampoo - 128 fl oz, Gallon
items.storedescription:
Apply small amount to hair and scalp. Rub in and focus on the adhesive area. It breaks down adhesive bonds and cleans residue off hair and scalp. Rinse like a normal shampoo. Rinse if needed.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
items.pagetitle: Beautify - Extension Prep Shampoo - 128 fl oz, Gallon | Walker Tape
